issue.title: About displaying Chinese fonts in graphs
issue.body:
# Troubleshooting

## Describe your environment

* Operating system: Mac
* Python version: Anaconda
* Hardware:
* Internet access:
* Jupyter notebook or not? [Y/N]: Y
* Which chapter of book?:

<!-- Texts appear in angle brackets like this are comments and will not show in your issue body. They are here to help you fill in this form. Feel free to remove those comments. You can also remove other texts that is irrelevant to your issue -->

## Describe your question

I want to make a wordcloud picture of Chinese words using matplotlib. But the output picture is garbled and Chinese words cannot display. Even I have tried the two potential solutions (### https://github.com/hupili/python-for-data-and-media-communication-gitbook/blob/7fad4125cbde74714dbe0da1f71649680d24d7ee/module-matplotlib.md and https://github.com/hupili/python-for-data-and-media-communication/blob/93ff76364e0374aaacf75f766efb4736d7a357b7/matplotlib-examples/Chinese%20Font.ipynb) in Github, they do not work. 

## The minimum code (snippet) to reproduce the issue
Please refer to the following link
https://github.com/ClioLI/Thorny-issues-of-Python

comment.body: Yes, the problem has been solved and Yucan said he will merge this to FAQ.

issue.title: About displaying Chinese fonts in graphs
issue.body:
# Troubleshooting

## Describe your environment

* Operating system: Mac
* Python version: Anaconda
* Hardware:
* Internet access:
* Jupyter notebook or not? [Y/N]: Y
* Which chapter of book?:

<!-- Texts appear in angle brackets like this are comments and will not show in your issue body. They are here to help you fill in this form. Feel free to remove those comments. You can also remove other texts that is irrelevant to your issue -->

## Describe your question

I want to make a wordcloud picture of Chinese words using matplotlib. But the output picture is garbled and Chinese words cannot display. Even I have tried the two potential solutions (### https://github.com/hupili/python-for-data-and-media-communication-gitbook/blob/7fad4125cbde74714dbe0da1f71649680d24d7ee/module-matplotlib.md and https://github.com/hupili/python-for-data-and-media-communication/blob/93ff76364e0374aaacf75f766efb4736d7a357b7/matplotlib-examples/Chinese%20Font.ipynb) in Github, they do not work. 

## The minimum code (snippet) to reproduce the issue

https://github.com/ClioLI/Thorny-issues-of-Python
